gridUnitTranslate(double, double) - Static method in class group24.piazzapanic.maths.Vector2
Creates an on-screen Vector2 from grid units, the parameters are translated to scale both x and y by Base.WINDOW_WIDTH, according the relative width of one tile, Base.TILE_GRID_UNIT.
gridUnitTranslate(float, float) - Static method in class group24.piazzapanic.maths.Vector2
Creates an on-screen Vector2 from grid units, the parameters are translated to scale both x and y by Base.WINDOW_WIDTH, according the relative width of one tile, Base.TILE_GRID_UNIT.
